page.title: 11TOURISM IN ST. TEATH
page.content: THE TOURIST INDUSTRY IN THIS AREA HAS GROWN RAPIDLY OVER THE PAST TWENTY YEARS. WHEREAS THIRTY YEARS AGO HOLIDAY ACCOMMODATION WAS VIRTUALLY UNKNOWN IN ST. TEATH, THERE ARE NOW MANY HOLIDAY COTTAGES, A TOURIST CARAVAN PARK AND A LARGE PROPORTION OF RESIDENTS PROVIDING BED AND BREAKFAST FACILITIES. TOURISTS USE ST. TEATH AS A CONVENIENT BASE FROM WHICH TO EXPLORE THE SPECTACULAR COASTAQL SCENERY OF NORTH CORNWALL.THE VILLAGE POPULATION IS THEREFORE VASTLY INCREASED DURING THE SUMMER MONTHS AND THIS PUTS A STRAIN ON LOCAL SERVICES. NARROW COUNTRY LANES ARE UNSUITED TO THE LARGE VOLUME OF TRAFFIC OCCASIONED BY THESE TOURISTS AND ACCESS TO NEARBY TOWNS IS MADE IMPOSSIBLE FOR THREE MONTHS EVERY YEAR DUE TO LONG QUEUES OF CARS AND CARAVANS.
